 Why can't I post a comments on the wall? I went there yesterday to Taco Bell in Al Mamlaka and it was HORRIBLE! I am an American, and this Taco Bell was awful! the food was a HUGE disappointment! There was almost NO meat on the taco or chalupa. The spicy chicken in the quesadilla was gross! There was NO packaged sauces, so we had to eat some sauce that didn't even taste like any of the taco bell sauces, and we really wanted the FIRE sauce. ALSO, NO NACHOS!!!! they gave us french fries....YUCK! My daughter really wanted the nachos. what a huge disappointment. ALSO, the beans were way too dry! I mean, are the employees so blind and dumb that they can't even add a little water to it? And, NO CHEESE on the bean burritos??? what is up with that? I don't understand at all...my friends who went the first month were so happy and impressed, but now it seems you run out of everything and only fill the chalupas with lettuce. I'm not a rabbit....I will never eat there again, and I'm not surprised that Taco Bell failed the first time it opened in Saudia. And, I'm going to tell all my friends not to even waste their time. I don't live in Riyadh, so I was actually excited to go there....huge waste of time and huge disappointment. what a shame. :(

 Dear Mrs. Fadhel, 
  
  
 Thank you for your email regarding our products. We appreciate the 
 opportunity to assist you. 
  
  
 Please be informed that at this time, Krispy Kreme products and stores are not 
 Halal Certified. 
  
  
 We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause you, and 
 we will be sure to forward your feedback on to the appropriate personnel for 
 their review. The Management Staff here at Krispy Kreme is always interested in 
 customer feedback. 
  
  
 Once again, thank you for your interest in Krispy Kreme. 
  
  
 Best regards, 
 Thomas Layer 
 Krispy Kreme Customer Experience 
  
  
  
 Thank you Thomas, 
  
  
 My main concern was about your stores here in the Middle East (Dubai, Kuwait, Bahrain.. ), they are a franchise I believe. 
 Do they use the same ingredients, as I know your flavourings may contain alcohol, and the glaze and donuts may contain lard. 
  
  
 Please clarify this for me, thank you and appreciate your feedback. 
 Have a good day. 
 Mrs.Fadhel 
  
  
  
 Dear Mrs. Fadhel, 
  
  
 Thank you for your email regarding nutritional information. We appreciate 
 the opportunity to assist you. 
  
  
 All our stores use the same ingredients. 
  
  
 We look forward to serving you again in the future. 
  
  
 Best regards, 
 Thomas Layer 
 Krispy Kreme Customer Experience

Contemporary Elegance, Cool Sophistication 
   
 A successful restaurant relies upon three primary elements: food, ambience, and service.  In addition, that elusive quality of โje ne sais quoiโ will ensure the popularity of any establishmentโฆMabu has hit upon this winning combination with their new Jeddah branch of their celebrated Beirut restaurant.   
  
 Their international menu which specializes in Pan-Asian cuisine (their spring rolls and sushi combos are excellent), as well as French/Italian offerings ensures culinary satisfaction for all diners.  The salads and pizzas are fresh and innovative, while the entrees such as the Mabu Grilled Chicken with potato puree and a deliciously rich mushroom sauce and the Salmon Teriyaki served with sautรฉed spinach and mushrooms both demonstrate the chefโs expert touch.   Save room for dessert as the French items are all excellent, in particular the Chocolate Fondant with orange sauce/ vanilla ice cream and the Crรจme Brule are some of the best in town.  
  
 Good food can be found all over Jeddahโฆbut the elegantly sophisticated atmosphere at Mabu is the singular element which will elevate your meal into a memorable dining experience.  Entering the heavy wooden doors and the delightful courtyard is just the first step into the world of Mabu โ a surprising restaurant which reveals its secrets as you penetrate the interior rooms past the Moroccan-style foyer with its delicately carved stone-work panels.  The main dining room is decorated in purple and black, a stylish combination accented by spotlights and enhanced by subtle mood music and elegant artwork.  The ambiance is akin to a trendy restaurant in New York or Beirut.  The waiters are prompt and attentive, and theyโre also knowledgeable about the unique menu items.  In fact, itโs so easy to lose yourself in your surroundings that youโll emerge from your meal with the feeling that youโve actually made a quick trip abroad!
